name: Casino Game Pack
overview: Casino Game Pack, also known as Casino Games on the cassettes and Radio Shack Casino Computer Games on the cover of the manual, is a collection of six casino-style games for the TRS-80. The package contains the following 6 games, each on one side of a cassette tape:* Baccarat: a recreation of the famous casino card game. Craps: in this game, you aren't supposed to be the person actually shooting craps. Instead you can bet for or against the shooter. Keno: this game is sort of like a lottery game where you try to match your numbers with numbers chosen by the computer. Roulette: similar to a real roulette wheel, you can bet on specific numbers, colors, or other bets. Slot Machine: this is a standard slot machine game where you pull a lever and hope to get lucky. Wheel of Fortune: another variant of a roulette wheel. Baccarat: casino card game.
